title: These folowynge be the priuyleges pardon and indulgence graunted to the bretherne and susters, [and] benefactours of the College churche of seynt Ioh[a]n Beuerley
author: Confraternity of St. John (Beverley, England)
notes: Printer's name from and publication date suggested by STC.
A list of indulgences granted to members.--STC.
Identified as STC 1984 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; mutilated, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
